sentences.original_sentence: " I went to Southeast Asia for walking tour with my friends when I was an exchange student of University of Malaysia .
sentences.corrected_sentence: " I went to Southeast Asia for a walking tour with my friends when I was an exchange student at the University of Malaysia .

sentences.original_sentence:
" 
     " I went to Thailand , Cambodia , Laos , Vietnam for three weeks .
sentences.corrected_sentence:
" 
     " I visited Thailand , Cambodia , Laos , and Vietnam for three weeks .

sentences.original_sentence: My favorite city among them is Chiang Mai in Thailand .
sentences.corrected_sentence: My favorite city among them is Chiang Mai in Thailand .

" 
     " The city was very calm and restfulness .

sentences.original_sentence: There were few people and cars in the road , so it was very quiet .

sentences.original_sentence: I stayed at Chiang Mai for three days .

     " The day , I just spent my free time for having a branch at the cafe and walking around the town in the city .

"

sentences.original_sentence: There were many vehicles called ' toktok ' so I took the vehicles many times during the trip .

sentences.original_sentence: It was very cold at night so my friends and I could n't sleep well .

"

sentences.original_sentence: There were six people in the boat .
sentences.corrected_sentence: There were six people in the boat .

sentences.original_sentence: The boat was swept away very fast , so it was exciting .

"
